name: Talking Speed
description:
Speed: Ben, Yes, No, Hohoho

Taking Speed Is A Fanmade Game Off Of Talking Ben But Instead.. speed..

This is a bit more scuffed than the original one but hey,  i made it in under an hour and its good for under a hour to be fair, anyway i shall be updating this game but i won't add a very interesting devlog yet, just an explanation of how and why i did it.
